title: Invalid block header
body:
### Description
I'm try to sync from scratch eth mainnet but getting the following issue, all the sync went fine until now

### START COMMAND
./besu/bin/besu --network=mainnet --sync-mode=FAST --pruning-enabled=true --metrics-enabled --rpc-http-enabled


### ERROR

> Dec 14 17:40:53 node-1 besu[2582654]: 2021-12-14 17:40:53.134+01:00 | EthScheduler-Services-5 (importBlock) | INFO  | CalculatedDifficultyValidationRule | Invalid block header: difficulty 11875615030204850 does not equal expected difficulty 11875889639676338
Dec 14 17:40:53 node-1 besu[2582654]: 2021-12-14 17:40:53.141+01:00 | EthScheduler-Services-5 (importBlock) | WARN  | PipelineChainDownloader | Invalid block detected.  Disconnecting from sync target. Failed to import block: Invalid block at #13773000 (0x594e4880f077ff9cf01500976d8c0b47cc8d3c77995860353e222a334b8060ad)
Dec 14 17:40:53 node-1 besu[2582654]: 2021-12-14 17:40:53.141+01:00 | EthScheduler-Services-5 (importBlock) | WARN  | PipelineChainDownloader | Chain download failed. Restarting after short delay.
Dec 14 17:40:53 node-1 besu[2582654]: java.util.concurrent.CompletionException: org.hyperledger.besu.ethereum.eth.sync.tasks.exceptions.InvalidBlockException: Failed to import block: Invalid block at #13773000 (0x594e4880f077ff9cf01500976d8c0b47cc8d3c77995860353e222a334b8060ad)
Dec 14 17:40:53 node-1 besu[2582654]:         at java.base/java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.encodeRelay(CompletableFuture.java:367)
Dec 14 17:40:53 node-1 besu[2582654]:         at java.base/java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.completeRelay(CompletableFuture.java:376)
Dec 14 17:40:53 node-1 besu[2582654]:         at java.base/java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture$UniRelay.tryFire(CompletableFuture.java:1019)
Dec 14 17:40:53 node-1 besu[2582654]:         at java.base/java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.postComplete(CompletableFuture.java:506)
Dec 14 17:40:53 node-1 besu[2582654]:         at java.base/java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.completeExceptionally(CompletableFuture.java:2088)
Dec 14 17:40:53 node-1 besu[2582654]:         at org.hyperledger.besu.services.pipeline.Pipeline.abort(Pipeline.java:180)
Dec 14 17:40:53 node-1 besu[2582654]:         at org.hyperledger.besu.services.pipeline.Pipeline.lambda$runWithErrorHandling$3(Pipeline.java:159)
Dec 14 17:40:53 node-1 besu[2582654]:         at java.base/java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Executors.java:515)
Dec 14 17:40:53 node-1 besu[2582654]:         at java.base/java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java:264)
Dec 14 17:40:53 node-1 besu[2582654]:         at java.base/java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1128)
Dec 14 17:40:53 node-1 besu[2582654]:         at java.base/java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:628)
Dec 14 17:40:53 node-1 besu[2582654]:         at java.base/java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:829)
Dec 14 17:40:53 node-1 besu[2582654]: Caused by: org.hyperledger.besu.ethereum.eth.sync.tasks.exceptions.InvalidBlockException: Failed to import block: Invalid block at #13773000 (0x594e4880f077ff9cf01500976d8c0b47cc8d3c77995860353e222a334b8060ad)
Dec 14 17:40:53 node-1 besu[2582654]:         at org.hyperledger.besu.ethereum.eth.sync.fullsync.FullImportBlockStep.accept(FullImportBlockStep.java:55)
Dec 14 17:40:53 node-1 besu[2582654]:         at org.hyperledger.besu.ethereum.eth.sync.fullsync.FullImportBlockStep.accept(FullImportBlockStep.java:31)
Dec 14 17:40:53 node-1 besu[2582654]:         at org.hyperledger.besu.services.pipeline.CompleterStage.run(CompleterStage.java:37)
Dec 14 17:40:53 node-1 besu[2582654]:         at org.hyperledger.besu.services.pipeline.Pipeline.lambda$runWithErrorHandling$3(Pipeline.java:152)
Dec 14 17:40:53 node-1 besu[2582654]:         ... 5 more


### Versions
* Software version: 21.10.3
* Java version: 11.0.11
* OS Name & Version: ubuntu 20.04
Hello thanks for you ticket. Do you have the hash of the pivot block ?

@matkt the pivot block wash 13772986
But the issue is on the glacier arrow fork block
thank you. do you have the hash instead of the block number. this is to see if your pivot block was on the canonical chain.
@matkt how can I get the hash? I have the same issue on different nodes. None of them can surpass this block

@matkt This just happened today

> Dec 27 07:21:07 node-1 besu[624]: 2021-12-27 07:21:07.391+00:00 | EthScheduler-Services-7 (requestCompleteTask) | INFO  | CompleteTaskStep | Downloaded 1017000000 world state nodes. At least 31136 nodes remaining.
Dec 27 07:21:53 node-1 besu[624]: 2021-12-27 07:21:53.294+00:00 | EthScheduler-Services-7 (requestCompleteTask) | INFO  | DefaultSynchronizer | Fast sync completed successfully with pivot block 13772986

Dec 27 07:23:21 node-1 besu[624]: 2021-12-27 07:23:21.584+00:00 | EthScheduler-Services-23 (importBlock) | INFO  | Pruner | Begin marking used nodes for pruning. Block number: 13772987 State root: 0xa6caebcee8ba58332d297dd6cb4fc434570917a241f0c82097517fb76ede6e2d
Dec 27 07:23:43 node-1 besu[624]: 2021-12-27 07:23:43.283+00:00 | EthScheduler-Services-23 (importBlock) | INFO  | CalculatedDifficultyValidationRule | Invalid block header: difficulty 11875615030204850 does not equal expected difficulty 11875889639676338
Dec 27 07:23:43 node-1 besu[624]: 2021-12-27 07:23:43.300+00:00 | EthScheduler-Services-23 (importBlock) | WARN  | PipelineChainDownloader | Invalid block detected.  Disconnecting from sync target. Failed to import block: Invalid block at #13773000 (0x594e4880f077ff9cf01500976d8c0b47cc8d3c77995860353e222a334b8060ad)
Dec 27 07:23:43 node-1 besu[624]: 2021-12-27 07:23:43.302+00:00 | EthScheduler-Services-23 (importBlock) | WARN  | PipelineChainDownloader | Chain download failed. Restarting after short delay.
Dec 27 07:23:43 node-1 besu[624]: java.util.concurrent.CompletionException: org.hyperledger.besu.ethereum.eth.sync.tasks.exceptions.InvalidBlockException: Failed to import block: Invalid block at #13773000 (0x594e4880f077ff9cf01500976d8c0b47cc8d3c77995860353e222a334b8060ad)

Dec 27 07:23:43 node-1 besu[624]: Caused by: org.hyperledger.besu.ethereum.eth.sync.tasks.exceptions.InvalidBlockException: Failed to import block: Invalid block at #13773000 (0x594e4880f077ff9cf01500976d8c0b47cc8d3c77995860353e222a334b8060ad)
Dec 27 07:23:43 node-1 besu[624]:         at org.hyperledger.besu.ethereum.eth.sync.fullsync.FullImportBlockStep.accept(FullImportBlockStep.java:55)

Dec 27 07:24:07 node-1 besu[624]: 2021-12-27 07:24:07.305+00:00 | EthScheduler-Services-24 (importBlock) | INFO  | FullImportBlockStep | Import reached block 13773000 (0x50b0cf3bbcdd84c5c77ca88c30fc32c28bb18f4fd6ef3a9b5db1bd2a3ce27600), - Mg/s, Peers: 25


 As far as it looks it is related to Arrow Glacier Block
